    • placeWorker

      public int placeWorker​(Cell c)
      A function to rule them all, a function to set them all
      Parameters:
      c - the cell where the worker will be placed
      Returns:
      0 if worker 0 is created, 1 if worker 1 is created, -1 if all worker are already initialized
